entities.name: arabella doreen figg
entities.description: Mrs. Figg is introduced as a resident of Little Whinging and the conversation revolves around her identity.

entities.name: dudley fudge
entities.description: Fudge is introduced as having a bored and lofty voice, questioning Mrs. Figg's identity.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is mentioned as living in Little Whinging, closely monitored by the authorities due to past events.

entities.name: madam bones
entities.description: Madam Bones is introduced as having a keen eye on Harry Potter's situation and mentioning past events.

entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as Fudge's assistant, to whom Mrs. Figg will leave her parentage details.

relationships.description: Mrs. Figg mentions that she lives close to Harry Potter in Little Whinging.
Madam Bones mentions that the situation of Harry Potter has always been closely monitored due to past events.
Fudge questions Mrs. Figg's identity and asks her about being a Squib.
Weasley is mentioned as Fudge's assistant, to whom Mrs. Figg will leave her parentage details.
Fudge is the supervisor of Weasley, his assistant.
